instructions: Tap the channel for IF . Scroll to select Android Phone Call and tap the blue plus sign next to Any phone call placed . Tap the channel for Then . Scroll to select Google Drive and tap the blue plus sign next to Add row to spreadsheet . Choose whether you want to receive notifications or not when the recipe runs and hit Finish.

Tap the channel for IF . Scroll to select Android SMS and tap the blue plus sign next to Any new SMS received . Tap the channel for Then . Scroll to select Google Drive and tap the blue plus sign next to Add row to spreadsheet . Choose whether you want to receive notifications or not when the recipe runs and hit Finish.
